extras.title: Pactcrest ☆ Metz
extras.character: No task is too difficult for a brave doggy! A girl who always charges forward. Fenrir lights up the meaning of life with her smiles every day!
extras.experience_record:
A top DJ at the Entertainment Center who loves death metal! She's active, cute, and always charges headfirst into things on a daily basis, cheering on her fans and passers-by alike!
"Today's Fenrir is also the cutest girl in the universe! Her cuteness is a marvel! She's so unimaginably cute that even a supercomputer cannot process it!"
If there's any trouble in this doggo's head, it must be the praise her fans throw at her, making that clueless head of hers even more absent than ever.

Secretly though, as the boss of Team Doggo, Fenrir seems to be intricately connected to the internal powers of the Entertainment Center. Other than serving as a dog tag, the bone-shaped ribbon on her back, "Gleipnir," seems to be able to unleash unimaginable power, transforming into giant claws of electricity that can rip apart anything in battle!

fashions.name: Tranquil Melody
fashions.desc: Under the clear sky and falling flowers, the bamboo beneath the eaves sing a tranquil melody. Playing the zither and flute, the pavilions and terraces as they were, these moments can linger a little longer.

extras.title: Purple Bamboo
extras.character:
Calm when encountering situations and possessing an excellent sense of judgment, Fiona is able to logically come up with strategies to deal with various crises.
She is very serious during official business and maintains an air of royal-like elegance in front of others. Fiona is also a woman of her word.
In contrast, she appears kind and gentle when interacting with others in private and does not carry a shred of arrogance in her bones. But, she won't reveal this side to the public.
extras.experience_record:
The head of Vera's second city, the underwater city of Innars. As the Archon of the underwater city, she holds the highest position in Innars.

Able and composed, Fiona is an excellent judge of situations who can logically come up with strategies to deal with various crises. Well-loved and deeply respected by the people of Innars, she's leading the city to a brighter future.

A former Executor of Hykros, Fiona was chosen as the Archon of Innars for her outstanding leadership, keeping her away from combat missions for a rather long time. However, if any major crisis befalls Innars, she is sure to pick up her weapon once more and protect the people of Vera.

Fiona knows very well that as the one in charge of Innars, she shoulders the responsibility of overseeing the city's operations as well as the hope of people to build a home for the future.

extras.title: Practicing speaking
extras.character:
An introverted and innocent girl who doesn't know much about the world. She is kinda afraid of strangers and prefers staying alone. Maybe that is why she is somewhat scared and shy in front of strangers. 
Always called "the kid with Madam Lin," she developed a sense of purpose—she must work harder and become stronger so that she wouldn't be a burden to Lin or let Lin's instructions go in vain.
extras.experience_record:
The daughter of an old friend to Lin. And somehow, she's now taken care of by Lin, and they even take action together. The girl doesn't seem strong, like a sick, weak child. 
She is currently under combat skill training for self-protection upon Lin's request. Though Ruby is learning something quite different from Lin's style, she is, at least, much healthier than before and capable enough for quite some tricky situations. 
She still has nothing but a vague idea about the world and herself, believing in Lin's instructions and description blindly, and relying on her for almost every decision. In the current situation, Lin comments that cultivating her independence is definitely the priority here.

extras.title: Pine Comet
extras.experience_record:
As the current leader of the HT201 Shelter, Bai Ling is in charge of its daily operation and combat command. She only recently took over the leadership, so she still seems a little overwhelmed and flustered when handling her work.
The sudden passing of the previous leader left Bai Ling in shock, and her over-worrying and anxiety-prone personality was also questioned by some members of the shelter. She considers leadership a heavy burden, and is often worried about how to make sure everything runs smoothly.
But she is also considerate, responsible, meticulous, and good at bookkeeping, so at the moment, HT201 looks like it's in good hands.

extras.title: Lost Art
extras.experience_record:
Dr. Rubilia, the former head of the Listener Project, is once again participating in Grayspace Entity studies, this time in the form of an Abyssant.

Very few people know about this due to her special status. The general public still remembers her as an exceptional researcher and promising scientist.
There was once a bright lone star that we couldn't help admiring, following, and firmly believing in. But before it could attain all the achievements it was destined to, it fell, faded, and perished right in front of our eager eyes.

At present, her chance of returning to normal human society is close to zero.

The Doctor must have long foreseen her fate.

extras.title: Mini Hurricane
extras.experience_record:
Gnonno's very proud of her grandfather, Nuok, who was part of the exploration team that discovered Innars, and wants to become an excellent explorer like him. But given how she's been doing so far, she is more or less a troublemaker, and that's already putting it lightly.

Full of energy, she simply doesn't want to stop having fun. When Gnonno's in the mood for an adventure, the only person in the city who can stop her is Archon Fiona.

She has already explored the neighboring areas and knows the complicated seas like the back of her hand. The adventurer in her never stops looking for somewhere new to explore. But since she's so restless and impatient, a lot of her plans were never carried out.

Several years ago, she persuaded her best friend to dive into the ocean with her to look for a meteor. But only Gnonno returned to Innars...

The incident was full of mysteries, and with subtle changes to Gnonno's personality and her state of mind, it is most likely that she cannot accurately describe what transpired. The only thing that was certain was that Gnonno gained the power to summon a strange, octopus-like creature and command its tentacles. She also calls the creature by the name of her missing friend.

Just about every single Innars resident thought it was bizarre. And they all tell their children to stay away from Gnonno at all costs.

extras.title: Moonstar Bracelet
extras.character:
Calm when encountering situations and possessing an excellent sense of judgment, Fiona is able to logically come up with strategies to deal with various crises.
She is very serious during official business and maintains an air of royal-like elegance in front of others. Fiona is also a woman of her word.
In contrast, she appears kind and gentle when interacting with others in private and does not carry a shred of arrogance in her bones. But, she won't reveal this side to the public.
extras.experience_record:
The head of Vera's second city, the underwater city of Innars. As the Archon of the underwater city, she holds the highest position in Innars.

Able and composed, Fiona is an excellent judge of situations who can logically come up with strategies to deal with various crises. Well-loved and deeply respected by the people of Innars, she's leading the city to a brighter future.

A former Executor of Hykros, Fiona was chosen as the Archon of Innars for her outstanding leadership, keeping her away from combat missions for a rather long time. However, if any major crisis befalls Innars, she is sure to pick up her weapon once more and protect the people of Vera.

Fiona knows very well that as the one in charge of Innars, she shoulders the responsibility of overseeing the city's operations as well as the hope of people to build a home for the future.

extras.title: Precious One
extras.experience_record:
He comes from a renowned family and is usually polite and modest, and is pleasant to be around.
However, it's a surprise for everyone to know that such a kind person once was tasked by Hykros's Archon to lead the Mooke Squad and pursue Abyssants all the way into Innars, the heart of the mysterious Vera region. His past deeds obviously don't fit with his gentle image.
"He has an iron will with an extraordinary strategic mind, which is what earned him the position of leader of the Mooke Squad. Never judge a book by its cover."
However, upon hearing such comments, the members of the squad actually have something else to add.
"Our leader?"
"Well, if he's not up to the task, he'd just have to go home and take on the family business."

According to the classified report, Icarus Ptéryga is a troublesome wildcard.
"To outsiders, he is the spokesperson for the advance units, treating everyone with respect and is always impeccable."
"To us, he has remained a steady, dependable leader, even writing the tedious reports himself... But he also tends to operate alone. Other than 'Special Team Missions' direct from the top, no one knew where and how to locate him..."
"And... for some reason... every time he laughs, it gives me... Well, the chills."
As the young heir to the Ptéryga family fortune, Icarus unsurprisingly was coveted by all factions when he first availed himself. Spies and informants were sent after him, but they all met their demise.
Of course, that included many groups.
Ultimately, the files on Icarus were classified as top secret on a "Need to Know" basis.
After all, ignorance is bliss when the final outcome cannot be changed.

extras.title: Vermilion Bird
extras.experience_record:
She emerged from an unknown dimensional passage, claiming to be from Domain 9, a region not registered in the Hykros database, to assist with the Grayspace Entity problem. With eccentric clothes and a headpiece in the shape of a fiery bird, Lan attacks with a strange umbrella that unleashes an enormous amount of energy when attacking.

Her naive and cheerful appearance makes it easier to approach and become friends with her. She seems to be interested in food and traveling, having explored all of Mirroria shortly after arriving in Vera.

Sometimes, however, her words send chills down the spines of her companions. Kanro, her partner from Domain 9, often calls her Zhuque. What other secrets are they hiding?

fashions.name: Fluffy White Chocolate
fashions.desc: In winter, a full set of fluffy clothes is a necessity, including your ears! Also, don't forget to spray on some sweet, milky white chocolate perfume before you leave the house!

extras.title: Gleipnir
extras.character: No task is too difficult for a brave doggy! A girl who always charges forward. Fenrir lights up the meaning of life with her smiles every day!
extras.experience_record:
A top DJ at the Entertainment Center who loves death metal! She's active, cute, and always charges headfirst into things on a daily basis, cheering on her fans and passers-by alike!
"Today's Fenrir is also the cutest girl in the universe! Her cuteness is a marvel! She's so unimaginably cute that even a supercomputer cannot process it!"
If there's any trouble in this doggo's head, it must be the praise her fans throw at her, making that clueless head of hers even more absent than ever.

Secretly though, as the boss of Team Doggo, Fenrir seems to be intricately connected to the internal powers of the Entertainment Center. Other than serving as a dog tag, the bone-shaped ribbon on her back, "Gleipnir," seems to be able to unleash unimaginable power, transforming into giant claws of electricity that can rip apart anything in battle!

likeabilities.desc: Increase final damage by <shuzhi>13%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>2</> weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by <shuzhi>18%</>. Activate by equipping <shuzhi>3</> weapons of different elements.

extras.title: Mobius
extras.character:
A girl-next-door who guards everyone at Outpost 10 with energy, enthusiasm, and devotion.
Despite being so clumsy that she can't even walk without stumbling at times... It's not a problem she can't overcome!
Umi still does her best on every day's patrol!
She's also committed to becoming an extraordinary Executor and magician, one step at a time.
extras.experience_record:
A newly appointed Executor who's always full of energy.
Outside of her duties in guarding the outpost, she also practices magic tricks tirelessly, hoping to inject some fun and energy into the otherwise routine life of guarding the site.
Honestly, it doesn't matter what Umi does. As long as she's around, life is colorful enough... However, she doesn't seem to realize that yet.

fashions.name: Platinum Radiance
fashions.desc: Shortly after Alyss's headache was cured, Mirroria Department of Science and Technology discovered previously unknown information in the Unyielding Wing. By reconstructing the data and importing it to the Unyielding Wing, they created a new Platinum Armor Form that differs from Anisoptera or Lepidoptera.

extras.title: Unyielding Wing
extras.character:
A stubborn and ambitious person who strictly follows the rules and cares about how others see her. Despite having an aura that keeps people away, Alyss is actually quite a personable woman if you have the courage to talk to her.
She keeps an orderly lifestyle, and everything in her room must have its reason for being there.
She is a bit prideful of her talents over others. Despite having a real knack for combat, she trains vigorously and harder than anyone else at the Security Force, always striving to be better.
extras.experience_record:
Codenamed M-sec 2000, she may be a Special Forces Agent who's only recently joined the Security Force, but her unparalleled talents and hard work are widely recognized across the Force. Due to her outstanding simulation results, she has been assigned to take part in the Security Force's high-level missions.

She used to suffer from unexplained headaches, but with the help of some people, she has now fully recovered.

The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward.

fashions.name: No Fear of the Sun
fashions.desc: UV rays are the enemy of all women... But she seems to enjoy bathing in the sunlight.

extras.title: Clover Cross
extras.character: A stereotypical maid who's calm, poised, composed, elegant, and able to handle all kinds of emergencies... or that's how it's supposed to be. She has a habit of needing a direct command from her "Master" for every minuscule thing she does before doing them, while also reporting back at every step. The inability to make any kind of decisions is her fatal weakness, which causes a bit of an awkward "lag" in actual operations. Also, despite being always polite and courteous, curiously enough, she does sometimes use rather coarse language in her usual humble tone...
extras.experience_record:
One of the seven great urban legends on Mirroria's anonymous forum—the crimson vampire maid who lurks in the lower city...
The mysterious girl turns out to be holding multiple part-time jobs, which even include being a bodyguard, just to make a living. As it doesn't really seem out of the ordinary, the urban legend has been found to be gossip that was blown out of proportion.
She herself insists that she is only a servant who does her job and follows the commands of her "Master" on the other end of the communicator. The identity of this "Master," however, remains a mystery.
That said, she does feel like a vampire in some regards... but she probably is just an ordinary person who's good at shooter games and talks a bit weirdly...

likeabilities.name: Log: Bodyguard and the Part-time Job
Gas (boom!)

likeabilities.name: Log: Other End of the Line
Gas (boooom!)

extras.title: Thunderbreaker
extras.character:
He often yawns and appears disorderly, and frequently plays an active part in revitalizing the team's spirits.
The fact is though, he's a very thoughtful person with a warm exterior and a cold interior, who does not easily reveal his true feelings.
extras.experience_record:
An employee of Mirroria Nursery and a lover of flowers. Because he's responsible for the promotion and daily care of the plants for the nursery, he earned the nickname, "Manager."

In reality, he is the top Executor of District 7 with unfathomable strength. However, few know about this secret of his, being regarded as the "Ace in the Hole" of District 7, only acting when Mirroria is in crisis.

During a battle with an Abyssant, he fended off an Abyssant's energy attack with his left hand, which left it severely burned. After undergoing tissue regeneration surgery, in order to fight better, he donned an armored glove that matched the combat characteristics of his weapon "Thunderbreaker."

extras.title: Vesper
extras.character:
Very few even know the detached, composed, low-profile, current manager of the Maidelin Foundation exists.
Not one to meddle, but definitely pitches in when things hit the fan.
"I'm just following Ms. Maidelin's will."
extras.experience_record:
Born into a wealthy Banges family, she had an above-average education and was always well-behaved. She and her family were assaulted by aberrants one day, and her parents lost their suppressors. 
They didn't "die," but became aberrants instead. Just as an Executor was about to put them out of their misery, Pepper, who survived, begged the Executor not to do it. Now they are confined somewhere, and the family wealth is being slowly depleted to pay for their care.
That's why Pepper works in the medical department at Hykros. She chose to spend the rest of her life finding a way to reverse the aberration...

fashions.desc: Even this well-known busy person of Mirroria occasionally enjoys some time off by the exclusive luxury pool.

fashions.name: Azure Heart
fashions.desc: "Maybe I would be wearing this if I had gone to Innars for work, rather than stay in Mirroria." Perhaps this is the reality of another universe.

fashions.name: Long Snowfall
fashions.desc: She is like the extravagant snowfall that shouldn't exist in the desert. Drifting silently on faith, she guards the dreams of everyone in the long night.

extras.title: Shadoweave
extras.character:
A young officer exuding an imposing aura.
A clean freak who can't stand a single speck of dust. She also holds herself and others to high standards. This makes her seem a stickler for rules, but she is amiable to discussions.
Her elite education made her what she is today: A decisive, competent perfectionist.
extras.experience_record:
The only daughter of Harunobu, the previous local Archon. She has been groomed to be the successor. Despite not having taken the seat yet, popular opinion already favors her as the next Archon in line.
She has been receiving rigorous combat training since childhood, which makes her much more suitable for fighting on the front line than pushing paperwork in an office, and her results definitely back that up.
From the central district to the lower city, she is incredibly popular with the people.

fashions.desc: "Ultimate justice! Ultimate valor! The Ultimate Warriors who give Night City ultimate protection! Elegant, pure, mighty! Super, super ultimate!"

extras.title: Heartstream
extras.character:
Beneath her immature appearance is a heart that stands in stark contrast to this deceptive exterior. She is essentially a "mini adult" through and through.
However, there are occasions when her age and appearance break the surface—when no one is around, she sometimes practices voicing out one-liners as if in the heat of battle. She enjoys collecting basic figurines from the old days, in fact, she is quite the geek about it.
extras.experience_record: Captain of the Mirroria Security Special Forces, the user of the Super Flow, wielder of twin Tachi blade, and wears a kendo outfit indicative of her fighting style. One of the very few members in charge of protecting Mirroria without any bionic modifications.

fashions.name: Crimson Song
fashions.desc: The little girl receives the red cloak from her sister. Wow, she gets so excited that she forgets to hide her tail!

extras.title: Spark
extras.character:
An introverted and innocent girl who doesn't know much about the world. She is kinda afraid of strangers and prefers staying alone. Maybe that is why she is somewhat scared and shy in front of strangers. 
Always called "the kid with Madam Lin," she developed a sense of purpose—she must work harder and become stronger so that she wouldn't be a burden to Lin or let Lin's instructions go in vain.
extras.experience_record:
The daughter of an old friend to Lin. And somehow, she's now taken care of by Lin, and they even take action together. The girl doesn't seem strong, like a sick, weak child. 
She is currently under combat skill training for self-protection upon Lin's request. Though Ruby is learning something quite different from Lin's style, she is, at least, much healthier than before and capable enough for quite some tricky situations. 
She still has nothing but a vague idea about the world and herself, believing in Lin's instructions and description blindly, and relying on her for almost every decision. In the current situation, Lin comments that cultivating her independence is definitely the priority here.

extras.title: Balmung
extras.character:
Reserved, and decisive at work. 
She has unique understandings and philosophy for life, and would ponder on the true meaning of life when time allows.
extras.experience_record:
Born into a wealthy Banges family, she had an above-average education and was always well-behaved. She and her family were assaulted by aberrants one day, and her parents lost their suppressors. 
They didn't "die," but became aberrants instead. Just as an Executor was about to put them out of their misery, Pepper, who survived, begged the Executor not to do it. Now they are confined somewhere, and the family wealth is being slowly depleted to pay for their care.
That's why Pepper works in the medical department at Hykros. She chose to spend the rest of her life finding a way to reverse the aberration...

likeabilities.desc: Upon entering battle, gain <shuzhi>1.5%</> frost ATK boost for <shuzhi>5</> seconds every <shuzhi>3</> seconds . Stack up to <shuzhi>10</> times.

likeabilities.name: Log: Not a Demon After All
Icebound
likeabilities.desc: Upon entering battle, gain <shuzhi>2.4%</> frost ATK boost for <shuzhi>5</> seconds every <shuzhi>3</> seconds, with up to <shuzhi>10</> stacks. Also, gain hyperbody and immunity to control effects while in the Frost Domain.

fashions.name: Shirli!
fashions.desc: It's an image extracted from memories... It's just an illusion.

fashions.name: Ripple of Purity
fashions.desc: You know, they say a girl's budding youth and growth shape her brightest days. Hi, I'm Shirli, a nurse trainee at Astra Shelter. It's a pleasure to meet you.

extras.title: Venus
extras.character:
After the restructure consisting of procedures including brainwashing, memory-erasing, and a second character implant, she has been quite emotionally unstable for a while. 
The original character of Shirli was forced into suppression. Luckily, things have basically recovered, with slight concern remaining for some potential threat. 
Sure enough, she could never return to the Shirli filled with liveliness, but she's mostly recovered like an ordinary girl. 
The doubt about her own existence is still lingering, which embodies the restlessness and wounds left in her. Well... At least, she could summon the courage in the face of things, which is a sign of a good beginning.
extras.experience_record:
An Angel of Clemency newly born through restructure of Shirli, a nurse trainee at Astra Shelter, with half the flesh and nerves replaced by mechs and circuits.

As a human, she once suffered from direct impulse of Omnium Radiation due to damaged suppressor. However, before the complete aberration, she was sent to the Heirs of Aida for experimental treatment, which was miraculously a success. 

With her restructure recently done, she is the most unstable one among all Angels of Clemency, but also the one equipped with the latest technologies of the Heirs of Aida.

likeabilities.name: Nemesis: Metamorphosis
likeabilities.desc: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to <shuzhi>60%</> of ATK to all enemies within <shuzhi>30</> meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by <shuzhi>120%</> of ATK.

likeabilities.name: Log: In Front of the Bionic Eye
Nemesis: Sublimation

extras.title: Negating Cube
extras.character: Sharp-tongued, two-faced, competitive, and arrogant, especially when encountering tasks he deems beneath him. At times, he can show a level of maturity and discipline beyond his age, and he is exceptionally perceptive. But most of the time, he can't be any less interested in other peoples' words, and doesn't bother remembering things that serve him no interest.
extras.experience_record:
A geeky, computer genius who looks around 15 years old, born in Banges and nicknamed "Zero". However, his real name and personal details have been lost, deliberately destroyed by himself.
Highly adept at intelligence processing, electronic communications, and data management, Zero can find and extract huge amounts of information through the computer and network analysis. He once shocked Hykros by penetrating their security system in an audacious cyberattack, which led to him being designated a "person of interest". At present, Zero is under Hykros's strict control and oversight in an undisclosed location, where he engages in intelligence-related operations.

likeabilities.name: Zero: Accurate Calculation
likeabilities.desc: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

likeabilities.name: Zero: Overall Planning
likeabilities.desc: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

extras.title: Pummeler
extras.character:
She looks lazy and unmotivated when there's nothing to do, but becomes extremely excited and competitive in battle.
She's extremely proud of her robotic body, which is agile, powerful, and does not age. She's also stubborn and pushes herself to the limit, unwilling to go down before those with bodies made of flesh.
Mentally, however, she's still a child and reveals her fragile side when she's with her father.
extras.experience_record:
During the Old Federation era, the private military contractor Victoria had planned to develop a series of elite battle droids. Ene was the prototype produced by the program.
The initial design aim was to make the perfect droid: self-aware, independent, and able to think, feel and act just like a human. The executive who approved the program uploaded a backup of his deceased daughter's consciousness into Ene as her "soul."
Ene was later granted her rights as a human, as the daughter of the Victoria executive.

likeabilities.name: Ene: Fast Mode
likeabilities.desc: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by <shuzhi>12%</>.

likeabilities.name: Ene: Beyond Limits Mode
likeabilities.desc: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by <shuzhi>20%</>.

extras.title: Rosy Edge
extras.character: Cold, aloof, and indifferent. She doesn't show any emotions at all. It's not that she's emotionless, she just refuses to build relationships with others.
extras.experience_record:
A senior Hykros Executor with no record of birth or age. According to the information available, Meryl excelled at S-level missions with her sword and combat skills, ascending from an ordinary officer to a senior Executor in just a few years.
She keeps an indifferent attitude toward everything, and no one knows what's really on her mind. It doesn't help that she has no mercy against her enemies, so people keep their distance from her whenever possible.
The database of Executors shows that Meryl has a close twin brother, but there are no records of this brother anywhere.

likeabilities.name: Meryl: Cool Rose
likeabilities.desc: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by <shuzhi>20%</>, gain immunity to the frostbitten effect, and reduce duration of being frozen by <shuzhi>50%</>.

likeabilities.name: Meryl: Frosted
likeabilities.desc: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by <shuzhi>25%</>, gain immunity to the frostbite effect, and reduce the duration of being frozen by <shuzhi>50%</>. The air around Meryl becomes cold, freezing the water around her.

extras.title: Thunderous Halberd
extras.character:
A clumsy girl who is full of vigor and likes to wear her mind on her sleeve.
Since she was rescued by a passing merchant, she wants to pay it forward by doing good deeds while traveling.
She hates evil, and equates good deeds with eliminating evil. Being young and inexperienced, she often judges someone based on questionable standards.
extras.experience_record:
Echo was born in Warren, and dreamed about stepping out of the land of the pure snow to see the rest of the world.
When she was nine, her shelter was destroyed by a sudden avalanche, during which her parents died saving her. She was then rescued by a passing merchant, and sent to a recovery facility in Banges.
After five years in Banges, she decided to go on a journey to punish evil and spread good.

likeabilities.name: Log: A Song of the Road
Echo: Uprightness
likeabilities.desc: When teamed up with Echo, allies within <shuzhi>10</> meters around Echo gain a damage boost of <shuzhi>4%</> (excluding Echo).

extras.title: Dual EM Stars
extras.character:
Samir does what she wants when she wants, and she loves to play harmless tricks on others.
She's a Hykros Executor and has the chops to show, but her unreliable personality and penchant to play tricks haven't earned her a lot of friends. She doesn't seem to care, though...
extras.experience_record:
Her past is riddled with questions.
Currently, it is known that she was an orphan adopted by a Banges resident. She joined Hykros after reaching adulthood, and became an Executor after training.

She's a great shot, even among the elite Executors. Hykros once considered asking her to become the instructor for new recruits, but gave up on the idea because her personality just didn't match.

likeabilities.name: Samir: Trickery
likeabilities.desc: Grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Concentration for every <shuzhi>4</> seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by <shuzhi>3%</>, and can stack up to <shuzhi>4</> times. After being hit, Samir loses <shuzhi>1</> stack of Concentration, up to <shuzhi>1</> stack per <shuzhi>1</> second.

likeabilities.name: Samir: Shadow
likeabilities.desc: Grant <shuzhi>1</> stack of Concentration for every <shuzhi>4</> seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by <shuzhi>4%</>, and can stack up to <shuzhi>5</> times. After being hit, Samir loses <shuzhi>1</> stack of Concentration, up to <shuzhi>1</> stack per <shuzhi>2</> second.

extras.title: Molten Shield V2
extras.character:
Sometimes falls into a state of confusion or daze, due to missing some of her memories and parts of her identity data. Often wears a mask over her mouth, making communication even more difficult. Exceedingly quiet and introverted.
With little experience of the outside world, she is as innocent as a fledgling and has a detached air.
extras.experience_record:
A girl whose illness has bestowed strange powers, currently receiving treatment at Hykros.
For some reason, Huma has lost all memory of her past, as well as her former personality. Since waking up, the sum of Huma's knowledge about the world is limited to Hykros. Everything else merely makes her a little afraid and anxious.
Presently, all of Huma's personal relationships are with those medical researchers whom she has gotten to know during her treatment. These researchers have suggested Huma accompany others to explore the outside world, in the hopes of gradually returning her to a more normal existence. Huma, however, made an astonishing decision — choosing to be trained as a Hykros Executor.
The girl's reasoning is simple and pure — she feels reassured in the company of Executors, and wishes to use her abilities to pay back the kindness Hykros has shown her.

likeabilities.name: Huma: Fortitude
likeabilities.desc: Each time Huma receives damage, gain <shuzhi>1</> Fortitude mark and gain <shuzhi>1</> more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to <shuzhi>1</> time per <shuzhi>1</> second and <shuzhi>12</> stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×<shuzhi>0.4%</> HP for <shuzhi>12</> seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×<shuzhi>0.6%</> HP.

likeabilities.name: Huma: Iron Screen
likeabilities.desc: Each time Huma receives damage, gain <shuzhi>1</> Fortitude mark and gain <shuzhi>1</> more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to <shuzhi>1</> time per <shuzhi>1</> second and <shuzhi>12</> stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×<shuzhi>0.6%</> HP for <shuzhi>12</> seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks ×<shuzhi>0.9%</> HP.

extras.title: Icewind Arrow
extras.character:
An opportunist who trims her sails with the wind. Proactive, talkative, and loves to hang out.
She makes friends easily and doesn't get angry even when someone points out her opportunistic tendencies. She also has an open mind that is always taking in new and different ideas.
On the other hand, she is definitely not the kind of person who provides a sense of security.
extras.experience_record:
Hane's résumé shows that she spent some time at the Astra Shelter, was once a Hyena officer, and was an employee at Hykros, which her Simulacrum data is based on.
After that, she chose to betray Hykros and joined the Heirs of Aida.
The only word to describe her would be "unstable." No one knows what she's up to right now, but we can be sure that with her abilities, she is definitely not just a foot soldier in the Heirs.
She does not pick sides according to ideals, right or wrong, objectives or rules, as if none of these matters to her. She belonged to so many organizations, but she also didn't belong in any of them.

likeabilities.name: Tsubasa: Rainstorm
likeabilities.desc: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain <shuzhi>1</> stack of Fierce Strike, up to <shuzhi>1</> stack per <shuzhi>1</> second. Each stack adds <shuzhi>0.5%</> ATK, up to <shuzhi>15</> stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

likeabilities.name: Tsubasa: Raging Waves
likeabilities.desc: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain <shuzhi>1</> stack of Fierce Strike, up to <shuzhi>1</> stack per <shuzhi>1</> second. Each stack adds <shuzhi>0.6%</> ATK, up to <shuzhi>30</> stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

extras.title: Chakram of the Seas
extras.character:
She's antisocial, dislikes strangers, and gets nervous when meeting someone for the first time.
She doesn't even pay much attention to her partner, and only gets excited when the topic is something she is interested in. But then she talks a mile a minute, and gets angry when her partner can't keep up.
She's almost like a cat—cold and aloof most of the time, but gets angry when she wants attention and no one is around.
extras.experience_record:
"A lone-wolf ocean maniac" is what people say about Shiro, the oceanographer. This aloof girl becomes someone passionate and loyal when she's looking at the ocean.
When she came of age and showed her knack for oceanography, she traveled alone for several years and measured the ocean distribution of Aida, a monumental task that contributed significantly to humankind's understanding of Aida.

likeabilities.name: Shiro: Security Alert
likeabilities.desc: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by <shuzhi>10%</> and physical ATK by an additional <shuzhi>7%</> for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>16</> seconds.

likeabilities.name: Shiro: Red Alarm
likeabilities.desc: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by <shuzhi>16%</> and physical ATK by an additional <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>16</> seconds.

extras.title: Scythe of the Crow
extras.character:
Untamed and flashy, KING is someone who leaves a lasting impression because he fights more than he talks, and he's always giving off a menacing vibe. He may have a temper, but he's open to communication... sometimes.
KING lives for excitement and opts to put his materialism along with his values, which is measured in currency, on full display. He is a man of few words and dislikes those who talk more than they should, as well as those who try too hard to be morally superior.
He prefers solving problems and getting what he wants through brute force over complex considerations and meticulous strategies.
When it comes to KING, it is almost always better to keep questions about his personality to yourself.
extras.experience_record:
Out of all the unfortunate souls that owe the Banges Chamber of Commerce a lot of money at a high interest rate, something they did to themselves, KINGis a special case. He is the only one not sent to the mines to dig for the rest of his life, which is what the Chamber did to those who couldn't repay their debt.
It wasn't that the Chamber didn't want to. There simply wasn't anything they could do, even if they put a massive bounty on his head or deployed armed forces.
As a mercenary known for his aggressiveness, KINGis often called the personification of violence. He has been picking fights since he was young, and has what it takes to fight outnumbered. He makes a lot of money from each of his requests, but then spends the commission immediately...

likeabilities.name: KING: Coldblooded Swipe
likeabilities.desc: Every <shuzhi>7</> enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to <shuzhi>8%</> of Max HP.

likeabilities.name: KING: Fear Reaper

fashions.name: Argent Intuition
fashions.desc: It's difficult to find a balance between formal attire and work clothes. Only she insists that true art is a mix of practicality and artistry...

extras.title: Flaming Revolver
extras.character:
She might look serious and solemn, but she's actually rather unusual and quirky.
She doesn't have a lot of facial expressions, but once you get to know her, you will see that she's kind and full of ideas and emotions. She might even make an angry face when she's irritated.
She is a master mechanical engineer, but she works with feelings and not theories.
She tunes her creations with her "sixth sense," and often adds completely useless modules because she feels like it...
extras.experience_record:
Cobalt-B, which is not her real name, is a mechanical engineer on the Banges Tech weapon development team. Her position isn't too high up on the corporate ladder, because her test results aren't very good.
Only the people that she works with know that she is, in fact, the ace of the entire team. She doesn't care about basic theories, and only creates extremely effective weapons based on her instinct.
To test these weapons and collect combat data, she occasionally goes on operations with other soldiers and tries her weapons on poor Hyena members.

extras.title: Absolute Zero
extras.character:
A naive girl with a positive attitude. She's always relying on others, sometimes to the point where they think she's gullible or trusts strangers too easily.
She has a sweet tooth, but somehow maintains a balanced diet. She is terrible with directions, but once she finds her way, she will never get lost again. It's hard to not worry about her, but she is perfectly capable of taking care of herself.
extras.experience_record:
Being the daughter of a Hykros medical researcher, Cocoritter started showing her talents in the art of healing at a young age, and joined the lab where her parents worked, absorbing as much medical knowledge as possible.

She's been roaming the land, traveling from one shelter to another and treating the injured. She takes this duty very seriously, and considers the experience necessary for becoming a veteran medical staff.

likeabilities.name: Cocoritter: Assistance
likeabilities.desc: When Cocoritter uses a support weapon, increase healing effects she inflicts on others and receives by <shuzhi>20%</>.

likeabilities.name: Cocoritter: Trust
likeabilities.desc: When Cocoritter uses a support weapon, increase healing and healing received by <shuzhi>20%</>. And when Cocoritter uses a support-type weapon's discharge skill or weapon skill, increase nearby allies' ATK by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

extras.title: Guren Blade
extras.character: Dependable, tenacious, and overwhelmingly excited when it comes to battle. Comes across as aloof, but is kind and passionate once people get to know her. Claudia has a burning sense of justice, standing always ready to help others and fight injustice wherever she finds it.
extras.experience_record:
A tall Hykros Executor with a bit of a military demeanor.
Her mastery over one-handed swords and mobility saw her on the front lines of difficult operations, but Claudia was sent to a medical facility after being severely injured in Operation Dark Apocalypse.

likeabilities.name: Claudia: Blink
likeabilities.desc: Go invisible for <shuzhi>1</> second upon dodging.

likeabilities.name: Claudia: Shadow
likeabilities.desc: Go invisible for <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds upon dodging.

extras.title: Thunderblades
extras.character:
A cheerful one who also tries to cheer everyone else up. Extroverted, honest, optimistic, and a little over joyous at times.
He's always practicing flashy dagger tricks, and collecting bad jokes that he tells often.
Under his carefree appearance lies strong determination. Once he commits to something, he will not stop until it's done, and it's also why he's sometimes too hard on himself.
extras.experience_record:
As an ex-Executor, Crow maintains a good relationship with Hykros. He didn't make any critical mistakes, and he was not let go due to poor performance. He simply realized that he longed for a life with fewer rules after working with the team there for a while, and made the decision that worked for him.
He now travels freely over long periods of time. His cheerful personality leaves a great first impression on those who he comes across, and he always performs new tricks or jokes when he arrives at a new place. They call him Crowy, and he doesn't mind.

likeabilities.desc: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>6%</> and reduce damage received by <shuzhi>4%</>.

extras.title: Staff of Scars
extras.character:
A popular nurse known for her patience, kindness, and smile. While known for her efficient work ethic, her body and stamina can't quite keep up. Combined with her perfectionism, she is constantly fatigued.
She was diagnosed with severe insomnia, light anxiety, and obsession, though none of the symptoms are obvious due to her strong self-discipline.
extras.experience_record:
Born into a wealthy Banges family, she had an above-average education and was always well-behaved. She and her family were assaulted by aberrants one day, and her parents lost their suppressors. 
They didn't "die," but became aberrants instead. Just as an Executor was about to put them out of their misery, Pepper, who survived, begged the Executor not to do it. Now they are confined somewhere, and the family wealth is being slowly depleted to pay for their care.
That's why Pepper works in the medical department at Hykros. She chose to spend the rest of her life finding a way to reverse the aberration...

extras.title: The Terminator
extras.character:
A cheerful, passionate, and friendly girl who is carefree and not meticulous.
She doesn't care about gender, age, or social standing, and treats everyone the same. Even Theo, the son of Banges Tech's owner, is a good friend.
But she is also careless and forgetful, sometimes even leaving her weapon at home...
extras.experience_record:
Hilda is the "star" of Banges Port, where everyone knows her name.
Banges is her home, and she feels that she must protect it.
She doesn't have a steady job, and just works part-time at the shops by the port, occasionally dabbling in patrolling and security. When she's tired, she takes time off to shop and enjoy good food.

extras.title: Nightingale's Feather
extras.character:
Lacks confidence and worries too much. She cares more about what other people think than about her own ideas, so it makes her sensitive and anxious over small things. On the other hand, she's also down-to-earth, kind, polite, and meticulous.
She's still learning and growing. Having realized her own problems, she's slowly trying to become someone capable of taking charge.
extras.experience_record:
As the current leader of the HT201 Shelter, Bai Ling is in charge of its daily operation and combat command. She only recently took over the leadership, so she still seems a little overwhelmed and flustered when handling her work.
The sudden passing of the previous leader left Bai Ling in shock, and her over-worrying and anxiety-prone personality was also questioned by some members of the shelter. She considers leadership a heavy burden, and is often worried about how to make sure everything runs smoothly.
But she is also considerate, responsible, meticulous, and good at bookkeeping, so at the moment, HT201 looks like it's in good hands.
